title: Resurrection and the Forgiveness of Sins
itunes:title: Resurrection and the Forgiveness of Sins
description: St. Peter's impassioned sermon in the temple precincts condemned the people for killing the "author of life", but further explains that Jesus' resurrection means that he is forgiving the people for their sin. His return heralds his rescuing us, if we let him. We are inseparable from God's love, and will be forgiven for our sins.
